thread.title: Jennifer Lawrence Thinks Donald Trump's Presidential Run Is a Joke
thread.title_full: Jennifer Lawrence Thinks Donald Trump's Presidential Run Is a Joke

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Jennifer Lawrence Thinks Donald Trump's Presidential Run Is a Joke
text:
Comments The 'Hunger Games' actress believes that if Trump wins the presidential election, it would be the end of the world. 
Apparently Jennifer Lawrence shares her " The Hunger Games " character Katniss Everdeen's feelings about her country's leader. Her name appears in the same sentence as Donald Trump 's after the actress slams the Republican presidential candidate for being "politically incorrect". "If Donald Trump becomes president, that will be the end of the world," Lawrence said in an interview with Entertainment Weekly. He co-star Liam Hemsworth agreed and said, "I'll back you up on that." Her other co-star Josh Hutcherson called it "a publicity stunt," adding, "It can't be real." Lawrence went on criticizing the business tycoon turns reality TV host turns politician. "I genuinely believe that reality television has reached the ultimate place where now even things like this might just be for entertainment," she said. "It's either that or it's Hillary's brilliant idea." She was particularly put off by how his supporters viewed him. She said, "I was watching him on the campaign trail and one guy said, 'I love Donald Trump because he's saying everything I'm thinking and I just can't say it because of the PC factor.' And I'm thinking, 'You are absolutely right. That's who I want representing my country, somebody politically incorrect. That will just be perfect.' "
